displayName.text: Love, Bonito Broadway - Women's Fashion & Clothing

authorAttributions.displayName: Love, Bonito Broadway - Women's Fashion & Clothing
Love, Bonito Broadway - Women's Fashion & Clothing

adrFormatAddress: 465 Broadway, New York, NY 10013-2607, USA

originalText.text: I loved shopping here today. The staff were awesome in helping me find sizes and styles- they were attentive, proactive, personable, and not too heavy on pushing sales. I enjoyed the selection. This will become part of my regular stops. I am dreading if this pop up does close on December 31!

text.text: I loved shopping here today. The staff were awesome in helping me find sizes and styles- they were attentive, proactive, personable, and not too heavy on pushing sales. I enjoyed the selection. This will become part of my regular stops. I am dreading if this pop up does close on December 31!

originalText.text: Super excited to find out that Love Bonito opened a location in NYC! And it certainly lived up to expectations. The store was very aesthetically pleasing with trendy pieces and had a great experience due to Marsha and others, will visit again.

text.text: Super excited to find out that Love Bonito opened a location in NYC! And it certainly lived up to expectations. The store was very aesthetically pleasing with trendy pieces and had a great experience due to Marsha and others, will visit again.

originalText.text: Extremely poor customer service. Waited weeks for my order only to be told after repeated follow-ups that it had been sent to someone else. No apologies or accountability and just shifted all blame to the courier. Eventually just refunded me without even asking if that’s what I wanted. Complete waste of time

text.text: Extremely poor customer service. Waited weeks for my order only to be told after repeated follow-ups that it had been sent to someone else. No apologies or accountability and just shifted all blame to the courier. Eventually just refunded me without even asking if that’s what I wanted. Complete waste of time

originalText.text: It's refreshing to see something new on the market inside the fashion pyramid. I love how how minimal and aesthetic the clothes look. I'm sadden that I wasn't able to get certain pieces I had wanted since this place is more of a "pop-up". The workers there were so sweet and well versed when answering my questions. I explained my problem and they were very informative and helpful. Hope there's more to see in the future! xoxo

originalText.text: My favourite brand of all time!! LB’s styles never disappoint, the pieces are always beautiful, form-flattering and timeless. The only store I have trouble controlling spending my money but it’s all worth it :’)
